summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Retinol Youth Renewal Night Cream visibly firms, and smooths skin with three types of retinol, while intensely hydrating and revitalizing skin
details: DetailsBenefitsRepairs and hydrates skin overnight while you sleep.Visibly firms and smooths skinStrengthens the skin barrier and targets both visible and future signs of agingGentle enough for nightly useFor all ages, skin types and tonesKey IngredientsRetinol Tri-Active Technology: (fast-acting, delayed-release, booster) delivers quick and sustained retinol benefits for visibly firmer, smoother skin and a more even-toned look.Niacinamide: helps strengthen skin's protective barrier for healthier-looking skin.Dipeptide: helps visibly improve skin firmnessResearch ResultsIn 4 weeks:97% noticed more hydrated skin86% saw firmer, more revitalized skin93% noticed smoother skin textureItem 2556346How To UseAt night, massage evenly over face and neck. Follow with your favorite Murad sunscreen during the day.Reduce frequency if sensitivity occurs.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Isostearyl Hydroxystearate, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C14-22 Alcohols, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrolyzed Yeast Extract, Isopropyl Palmitate, Retinol, Retinyl Propionate, Oleyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Serine, Hexyldecanol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Glycerin, Polyglucuronic Acid, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Room Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Algin, Caprylyl Glycol, Swertia Chirata Extract, Lecithin, Pullulan, Disodium Phosphate, Potassium Phosphate, PEG-75 Stearate, Ceteth-20, Steareth-20, Cetyl Hydroxethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Picolinamide, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: At night, massage evenly over face and neck. Follow with your favorite Murad sunscreen during the day.Reduce frequency if sensitivity occurs.

reviews.headline: Get rid of the strong perfume!
reviews.comments: It's a great formula as far as how it performs: it spreads easily and moisturizes my oily, acne-prone skin without feeling heavy or greasy. However, I do not like the scent! Other reviewers have also mentioned the strong scent. For me, the scent is so strong to the point that it gives me a sinus headache! It's a good thing I bought it for 50% off because once I use it up, I will not be repurchasing it!

reviews.headline: Good product, not a fan of fragrance
reviews.comments: Product did its job and worked well, I just really dislike fragrance in my skincare.

reviews.headline: Don't recommend
reviews.comments: Made my skin very dry not very moisturizing

reviews.headline: Works but Dries Out Skin
reviews.comments: I noticed a difference in my face regarding reducing the appearance of wrinkles, but my skin felt much drier. I will continue to use but with an additional moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Fantastic product!
reviews.comments: I use a prescription retinol for my face but it's too harsh for my neck, this product is perfect for my neck, no more loose Crepe skin

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing and fresh nice for night

reviews.headline: Broken pump
reviews.comments: Cream is great, pump stopped working so only got to try it for a couple nights and skin feels great not too drying but definitely exfoliates.

reviews.headline: Breakouts
reviews.comments: This cream made me start having pimples and random areas when I never get any. It's moisturizing. I don't see an amazing difference in my skin after a week of use. I would go with something else and this is very expensive. I hope I'm able to return it because I can't even use it unless I want pimples.

reviews.headline: retinol
reviews.comments: love it

reviews.headline: I buy this product over and over again.
reviews.comments: I have used for years now and like the way it makes my skin feel so good.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Great skin treatment

reviews.headline: Amazing Night Cream with Quick Results!
reviews.comments:
I recently started using this night cream, and I am absolutely in love with it! Even in a short period, I've noticed significant improvements in my skin's texture and overall appearance. It leaves my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and visibly more radiant each morning.

Not only is the night cream fantastic, but every product from this line that I've tried has been exceptional. It's rare to find a skincare line where every product delivers, but this one does. I highly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.headline: its great
reviews.comments: its been a month and I can see more of a glow to my skin. However,  i did pair it with a hydrating serum (night) and a vita-C for the day with my Gel moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Strong perfume smell
reviews.comments: Why do so many face creams have synthetic fragrances? It drives me crazy.  And this was developed by a dermatologist?  So many people are sensitive to perfumes and it's just not needed.  Who wants to sleep to the overpowering smell right around their nose or wear face creams with perfumes?  If you do wear perfume then all these smells fight each other. I like the product but hate the overpowering granny perfume scent.  Ugh.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Great beginner level retinol with lovely moisturizer too. I use this on my neck where my skin is more sensitive and this doesn't irritate at all.

reviews.headline: not moisturizing enough for me
reviews.comments: I wake in morning to find lots of dry skin and lines from the dryness. Not as moisturizing as Murad Resurgence Night Creme. disappointed.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: After using this product for several weeks, I noticed a visible improvement in the appearance of my skin. My fine lines and wrinkles appeared less noticeable, and my skin felt smoother and more hydrated. I also appreciated that the cream absorbed quickly and did not leave a greasy or heavy feeling on my skin.

reviews.headline: Liking it so far
reviews.comments: Great product! Applies great over the skin. Needed one pump for my face and one for my neck. I love the packaging. There is no fragrance that I can tell which I appreciate in a night cream. It is pricy but murad works.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: This retinol is OK. It's definitely more tame than other retinol's that I've used in the past. I haven't ramped it up to a every night thing but more like a night or two during the week. I think I need to continue using to see full benefits, but so far OK.

reviews.headline: Night Cream
reviews.comments: This night cream is good for helping with expression lines, giving the skin a fresh and youthful appearance. I like its packaging, it is very practical. It is a product that I have implemented to my pm routine  and I love it.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have terribly clogged pores  I always have It would leave me with a lot of texture all over especially on my nose ,chin, cheeks and temples. I'd have to wear a full cover foundation and never wanted to be seen bare faced because I had dark dots all over. people understand zits but not hundreds of dark pores I've had ppl ask what are those dots all over your face? my face is fair so those dots are even more noticeable. I never was able to wear glowy foundations or put highlight on my cheekbones and bridge of my nose because I too afraid to draw attention to it. The texture of my nose was especially noticeable like uneven dark Braille and so deep I couldn't even extract them.I know you're not supposed to pick but I'd be so desperate just for smooth skin I'd accept the redness and broken skin it'd leave me with if I could lessen the amount of bumps. I thought a strong face wash would solve my problem and sometimes glycolic based products would help but just temporarily and salicylic acid just helped acne the clogged pores caused but salicylic didn't unclog my congested skin. I don't like scrubs daily even though those helped turn my skin over more than just washes, I needed something stronger in a different way. This is the only product I have ever rated five stars it has turned over my skin has gotten all the dead skin makeup dirt out of my pores and my skin is the clearest it's EVER been thanks to this product the dark dots are gone my skin is smooth. I saw instant results from the first over night use and after prolonged use I was able to go from a whole over night layer daily use to just spot treatments when I thought I needed it. I was also able to buy a gentle face wash because this did all the work for me that was nice. I know this is mainly ment for anti aging but this has changed my life my skin is so  smooth also my pores are way smaller I'm no longer afraid to be seen bare face or wear highlight. It's never irritated my skin I can build it up onto spots that are alil more stubborn without redness or dryness. The smell is a little offputting it smells like floral baby powder. I thought that was going to irritate and break me out when I first used this product because I'm normally sensitive to scents but it faded once it dried and didn't affect me at all. I ran out a few days ago and I can already see my skin reverting back to its old ways so I need to go buy more the packaging is heavy so don't let that fool you into thinking you have a lot left. turn the bottle upside down to get a feeling for how much is left the bottle has a white color paper surrounding the yellow cream inside so if u turn it upside down you'll see the inside mechanism move upwards as you run out. If you have pore problems please try this I can't imagine my life without this now.
faceoff_positive.headline: Changed MY WHOLE routine!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was using the Murad daily retinol cream and switched over to the night cream with hydration, thinking this would work better for my dry skin and because I always applied at night. I still use a separate moisturizer afterwards and always have as I am aware retinol can dry your skin out. I am telling you DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT if you have dry skin. I've been using Aloe, baby oil, argan oil, aquafor, vaseline whatever I can to repair the dryness and make the burning and itching go away. My skin is SO dry, it's flaking off. Someone mentioned sandpaper and that's exactly what your face turns into. At first I thought I was having an allergic reaction to something, but I know now it is this cream. It won't happen at first, but after 2-3 weeks of use you'll develop a rash and then sandpaper. I stopped using it for a week and then restarted to see if it was the cream, and it was. Keep in mind after a week off of using it my face still wasn't healed. It became so uncomfortable/painful honestly I wanted to tear my face off.
faceoff_negative.headline: Made my cry- Not in a good way
